name: Apocalypse Aid
description:
By Mel Q. and Ceyda T.

Apocalypse Aid is a collecting game in which the player is given a certain amount of time to collect all the necessary items of the first aid kit and treat the zombie-infected 

The goal of the player is to collect 20 blankets, 15 water bottles, 3 medicine containers, and 5 lighters. These are all necessary for the treatment of the infected person.

Controls:

Up Arrow Key = Up
Down Arrow Key = Down
Left Arrow Key = Left
Right Arrow Key = Right
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
